Articles.Content:
I have had a problem with my KSP lately, when installing/removing mods sometimes the terrain becomes brownish and dark, and the mountains lose their sharpness. Reinstalling KSP works but I want to know if anyone has an idea of how to prevent this from happening in the first place.

Edited February 16, 2015 by LayTzz_swe

Post this in the troubleshooting forum. I'm sure you will get better help there.

I myself would just download a fresh copy of KSP. Of course, back up your saves and make sure all the mods you are using are compatible for the version of KSP you are playing.
